body_content.explanation: any type of repeated work that is boring and makes you feel tired and seems to have no positive effect and no end:
examples: There were days when having kids seemed like an endless treadmill of feeding, washing, and nappy-changing.

body_content.explanation: an exercise machine that consists of a moving strip or two step-like parts on which you walk without moving forward
a wide wheel turned by the weight of people climbing on steps around its edge, used in the past to provide power for machines or, more usually, as a punishment for prisoners
